allRound.name: Sentinel
allRound.description: A balanced warrior with equal prowess in all combat disciplines.

allRound.name: Nexus
allRound.description: A versatile fighter capable of adapting to any battlefield situation.

allRound.name: Zenith
allRound.description: Master of all trades with exceptional versatility in combat.

allRound.name: Vortex
allRound.description: A struggling warrior still learning the ways of balanced combat.

allRound.name: Prime
allRound.description: An experienced fighter with well-rounded combat abilities.

allRound.name: Core
allRound.description: The foundation of any team with consistent performance across all areas.

attacker.name: Blade
attacker.description: A fierce warrior whose devastating strikes can break through any defense.

attacker.name: Razor
attacker.description: Swift and deadly, this attacker strikes with precision and speed.

attacker.name: Fury
attacker.description: Unleashes overwhelming offensive power that crushes opponents.

attacker.name: Storm
attacker.description: A relentless force of nature that attacks with unstoppable momentum.

attacker.name: Rage
attacker.description: Berserker warrior who sacrifices defense for maximum offensive capability.

attacker.name: Strike
attacker.description: Specializes in quick, powerful attacks that catch enemies off guard.

attacker.name: Thunder
attacker.description: Lightning-fast attacker who delivers electrifying blows to opponents.

attacker.name: Inferno
attacker.description: Burns through enemy lines with fiery determination and power.

attacker.name: Crusher
attacker.description: Overwhelming strength that shatters defenses with brute force.

attacker.name: Viper
attacker.description: Deadly precision strikes that find weaknesses in any armor.

attacker.name: Savage
attacker.description: Wild and unpredictable attacker who fights with primal ferocity.

attacker.name: Titan
attacker.description: Massive offensive presence that dominates the battlefield.

attacker.name: Wrath
attacker.description: Unleashes devastating attacks fueled by pure anger and determination.

attacker.name: Blitz
attacker.description: Lightning-fast strikes that overwhelm enemies before they can react.

attacker.name: Havoc
attacker.description: Creates chaos on the battlefield with relentless offensive pressure.

attacker.name: Reaper
attacker.description: Deadly attacker who strikes fear into the hearts of enemies.

defender.name: Guardian
defender.description: An unbreakable shield that protects allies with unwavering resolve.

defender.name: Fortress
defender.description: Impenetrable defense that stands firm against any assault.

defender.name: Bastion
defender.description: A strategic defender who uses positioning to protect the team.

defender.name: Shield
defender.description: The first line of defense, absorbing damage for those behind.

defender.name: Bulwark
defender.description: Massive defensive presence that blocks all incoming threats.

defender.name: Aegis
defender.description: Divine protection that shields allies from harm.

defender.name: Rampart
defender.description: Strategic defender who controls the battlefield through positioning.

defender.name: Barrier
defender.description: Creates an impenetrable wall that enemies cannot breach.

defender.name: Sentinel
defender.description: Ever-watchful guardian who never lets threats pass unnoticed.

defender.name: Warden
defender.description: Protects the team with tactical awareness and strong defenses.

defender.name: Palisade
defender.description: Strategic defender who uses terrain and positioning effectively.

defender.name: Citadel
defender.description: A fortress of defense that stands unyielding against all odds.

defender.name: Stronghold
defender.description: Unbreakable defensive position that secures the battlefield.

defender.name: Bunker
defender.description: Underground defender who protects from fortified positions.

defender.name: Keep
defender.description: The last line of defense, holding the line when all else fails.

strategist.name: Sage
strategist.description: Master tactician who outwits enemies with brilliant strategic planning.

strategist.name: Oracle
strategist.description: Foresees enemy movements and plans counter-strategies in advance.

strategist.name: Mind
strategist.description: Brilliant strategist who thinks several steps ahead of opponents.

strategist.name: Genius
strategist.description: Exceptional intellect that devises unbeatable tactical formations.

strategist.name: Tactician
strategist.description: Expert planner who coordinates team movements with precision.

strategist.name: Mastermind
strategist.description: Brilliant strategist who manipulates the battlefield to advantage.

strategist.name: Thinker
strategist.description: Analytical mind that finds optimal solutions to complex problems.

strategist.name: Planner
strategist.description: Meticulous strategist who prepares for every possible scenario.

strategist.name: Schemer
strategist.description: Cunning planner who sets traps and outmaneuvers enemies.

strategist.name: Advisor
strategist.description: Wise counselor who guides the team with strategic wisdom.

strategist.name: Intellect
strategist.description: Superior intelligence that dominates through strategic superiority.

strategist.name: Analyst
strategist.description: Data-driven strategist who makes decisions based on patterns.

strategist.name: Visionary
strategist.description: Forward-thinking strategist who sees the bigger picture.
